Package pl.put.poznan.BuildingInfo.model

Class CompoundLocation

java.lang.Object
pl.put.poznan.BuildingInfo.model.Location
pl.put.poznan.BuildingInfo.model.CompoundLocation
public class CompoundLocation extends Location
CompoundLocation is a location that can store other objects that inherit Location as children in a tree.
Version:
%I% %D%
